actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to modify an exemption relating to the territory for the sale of electric power of certain electric transmission systems, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Power Act to change from October 1, 1991, to December 31, 1993, the date which triggers an exemption for certain territory-restricted electric systems with respect to the sale of transmission services within a specified area.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to modify an exemption relating to the territory for the sale of electric power of certain electric transmission systems, and for other purposes.
